title: Milkduds, Dumpsters, and Hidden Videotapes
body: Welcome to the inaugural episode of MoxieTV! This is the first part of a what will hopefully become a weekly series that highlights events at The Moxie. In this edition, we discuss movies that are coming up and heading out, our March artist, and Moxie A Go-Go. Sit back, relax, and enjoy! *NOTE: That was probably the corniest synopsis of ALL TIME!
credits:
• DanHimself
  • French GuyJustin
  • High Five RecipientNicole
  • Cat's Shadow Provided ByAbbie
  • Written ByDan and Justin
  • Edited and Directed ByJustin
  • Music BySomeone Still Loves You Boris Yeltsen

title: The Amazing Moxie
body: "Caves smell like donkey fur," or so says the age-old proverb regarding spoofs of one's favorite reality TV show. In this, our second episode of MoxieTV, we discuss the coming of not one, but TWO new movies: THE MATADOR and DARWIN'S NIGHTMARE. Neither should be missed, nor should this episode... so quit reading the synopsis and watch it already!
credits:
• DanHimself
  • NicoleHerself
  • Phil KeoghanDan
  • Written ByDan and Justin
  • Directed and Edited ByJustin
  • Production AssistantNicole
  • Frightened SwansMeredith and Gretchen

title: LOST at the Moxie
body: It's hard to shackle this episode with a summary, but it basically boils down to a synopsis and trailer of WHY WE FIGHT, an interview with someone who's seen WHY WE FIGHT, customer reactions to THE MATATDOR, and our coolest spoof yet! Watch and ye shall see...
credits:
• NicoleHerself
  • KelleyHerself
  • DanHerself
  • Production AssistantsNicole and Kelley
  • Written ByDan and Justin
  • Directed and EditedJustin
  • Special Thanks toKenny White, and everyone who gave a customer reaction to THE MATADOR

title: The One In Vegas (drunk)
body: In hopes of livening up MoxieTV, we sent Justin to Las Vegas to film an "on location" episode. Unfortunately for us, Justin thought it would be more fun to drink and gamble away the funds we set aside for the show. Setbacks aside, the episode is now finished and ready for your viewing pleasure. Bonus points to the sharp-eyed viewer who spots a pair of green panties hidden in this episode.
credits:
• DanHimself
  • Written ByDan and Justin
  • Directed and EditedJustin
  • Makeup ArtistNicole

title: Moxie Adaptability
body: Ahh, lucky #5!  Can you believe we've made it this far?  We can't.  I won't ruin any of the major plot twists in this weeks episode, but let's just say it's a doozy! We even have special effects in this one!  Sort of...
credits:
• Written byDan and Justin
  • Edited and Directed byJustin
  • Half-naked manDUG
  • SophieNicole
  • Robert LangdonDan
  • The Other GuyJustin

title: Snakes in the Moxie
body: Episode 6 marks our shortest and most bizarre episode of MoxieTV to date. We had a good time filming it though, and in the end, isn't that the only thing that matters? That, and earning lots and lots of money. Enough about me, let's watch some MoxieTV!!!
credits:
• DanHimself
  • JustinHimself
  • NicoleHerself
  • Gray the SnakeHimself
  • Directed and Edited ByJustin
  • Written ByDan and Justin
  • Special Thanks ToEnterprise Lanes

title: Stone Reynolds
body: This was Team Moxie's official entry in the 2006 S.A.T.O. 48 hour film challenge. You might recognize many of the actors as Moxie employees, and Dug, who plays Stone, as the guy who's always standing around drinking in the back of the Cinebar. We were nominated for SIX awards (Best Picture, Best Editing, Best Direction, Best Screenplay, Best Sound, and Best Actor - Dug)... we won NOTHING. As is the case with all good awards ceremonies, another movie swept the event. Either way, we had a blast making it, and you can expect to see another Team Moxie film in next year's challenge.
credits:
• Directed and Edited byJustin Glow
  • Written byEveryone
  • Screenplay byDan
  • Actors and Actresses... Just watch the credits

title: zeMoxie show
body: This MoxieTV episode was shot in the style of zefrank's "the show." Quick cuts, quirkiness, and Dan's giant head... that's what we were going for in this episode. And before you ask, "no," nothing in the final scene was altered. No special effects, no redubbing, nothing. Dan really has super powers. Enjoy!
credits:
• Written byDan and Justin
  • Directed and Edited byJustin

title: No, that's Soft Tails: MoxieTV Bloopers, season one
body: In lieu of a new MoxieTV, here's roughly 13 minutes of Dan flubbing his lines. If you've just eaten, you might want to wait a while for your food to settle, unless, of course, you're used to looking at Dan for that long of time.
credits:
• DirectorJustin Glow
  • HostDan Chilton
  • Continual asker of "what are you laughing at?"Nicole Chilton

title: Moxie Spot for Jeremy Larson Concert
body: We were asked by the event coordinators for tonight's Jeremy Larson concert (04.10.07) if we'd like to make a short segment about The Moxie. We jumped on the opportunity, and threw it together in one day, which is kind of obvious. Either way, we had fun doing it, AND you get to hear the brand new Moxie theme song.
credits:
• Talking HeadDan Chilton
  • DirectorJustin Glow
  • Theme SongJ.R. Top
